data.title: Publications, Research and Education
data.text:
Cal/OSHA Publications

Cal/OSHA has many educational materials and resources available. Publications can be downloaded from our webpage or they may be picked up at a local Cal/OSHA office if available. Please check with the local Cal/OSHA office first by calling to ensure the publications are available. California workplace postings are available and can be downloaded at www.dir.ca.gov/wp.asp.

Electronic tools (eTools) with Action Kits are available and consist of various useful multi-media products, such as videos, compact discs (CDs), electronic publications, and presentation material. These educational materials and resources can be found at https://www.dir.ca.gov/dosh/etools/etools.htm.

Latest Updates and Added Publications

August 2024:

New Immigration Services for Farmworkers Pocket Guide – English/Spanish Updated Guide to Developing Your Workplace Injury & Illness Prevention Program

July 2024:

New Lockout/Tagout Guide – Spanish New Lockout/Tagout Sample Forms: Evaluation, Procedures, and Permit – Spanish New Exposure to Zoonotic Aerosol Transmissible Disease Hazards New Model Injury and Illness Prevention Program to Address Zoonotic Aerosol Transmissible Disease Hazards Updated Protecting Temporary Agency Employees - Information for Employers New Workplace Violence Prevention in Agricultural Operations for Employers Fact Sheet - Spanish New Workplace Violence Prevention in Agricultural Operations for Workers Fact Sheet - Spanish New Workplace Violence Prevention for General Industry (Non-Health Care Settings) for Employers Fact Sheet - Spanish New Workplace Violence Prevention for General Industry (Non-Health Care Settings) for Workers Fact Sheet - Spanish New Model Written Workplace Violence Prevention Plan for General Industry (Non-Health Care Settings) - Spanish Updated COVID-19 Non-Emergency Standards - What Employers Need to Know - Spanish Updated Health & Safety Rights: Facts for California Workers - Chinese (Simplified) Updated Health & Safety Rights: Facts for California Workers - Vietnamese Updated Health & Safety Rights: Facts for California Workers - Korean

June 2024:

New Combined Indoor and Outdoor Heat Illness Prevention Model Plan for Employers New Heat Illness Prevention for Indoor Places of Employment Fact Sheet for Employees New Heat Illness Prevention for Indoor Places of Employment Fact Sheet for Employers

May 2024:

Updated COVID-19 Non-Emergency Standards – What Employers Need to Know Updated Model COVID-19 Prevention Procedures

April 2024:

New Heat Illness Prevention Training Materials 2023 - Vietnamese New Hazardous Occupational Noise Guide New Model Injury and Illness Prevention Program for High-Hazard Employers – Vietnamese

March 2024:

Update Understand Your Workplace Safety and Health Rights Update Understand Your Workplace Safety and Health Rights - Spanish New Warehouse Employer Fact Sheet - Chinese (Simplified) New Warehouse Employer Fact Sheet - Korean New Warehouse Employer Fact Sheet - Punjabi New Warehouse Employer Fact Sheet - Vietnamese New Lockout/Tagout Model Program - Spanish Update How to Find Your Exact Coordinates with Your Android Phone Update How to Find Your Exact Coordinates with Your Android Phone - Spanish Update How to Find Your Exact Coordinates with Your iPhone Update How to Find Your Exact Coordinates with Your iPhone - Spanish New Field Sanitation Fact Sheet - Chinese (Simplified) New Field Sanitation Fact Sheet - Korean New Field Sanitation Fact Sheet - Punjabi New Field Sanitation Fact Sheet - Vietnamese New Silica General Industry Exposure Control Model Plan – Spanish New Silica General Industry Exposure Control Model Plan – Vietnamese New Emergency Silica Standard: Information for Employers – Spanish New Emergency Silica Standard: Information for Employers – Vietnamese New Emergency Silica Standard: Information for Workers – Spanish New Emergency Silica Standard: Information for Workers – Vietnamese New Emergency Silica Standard – What Employers Need to Know: Executive Summary – Spanish New Silica Standard – What Employers Need to Know: Executive Summary – Vietnamese Updated Model Written Workplace Violence Prevention Plan for General Industry (Non-Health Care Settings)

February 2024:

New Workplace Violence Prevention for General Industry (Non-Health Care Settings) for Employers Fact Sheet New Workplace Violence Prevention for General Industry (Non-Health Care Settings) for Workers Fact Sheet New Workplace Violence Prevention in Agricultural Operations for Employers Fact Sheet New Workplace Violence Prevention in Agricultural Operations for Workers Fact Sheet New Model Written Workplace Violence Prevention Plan for General Industry (Non-Health Care Settings) New Opioid Hazard Alert

January 2024:

Updated COVID-19 Non-Emergency Standards ‑ What Employers Need to Know - Spanish Updated COVID-19 Non-Emergency Standards ‑ What Employers Need to Know

See the categories listed below. To view a publication, click on the category, then click on the link following the title of the publication. Some formats are more suited for professional printing than others.

For questions regarding publications, please contact your local area office.

Publication Categories

Click a link to scroll the page to the selected publication category.
